title: CSIS Study Finds More Left-Wing Than Right-Wing Domestic Terrorist Incidents in Early 2025

scene.description: A wide shot of a bustling newsroom with journalists working on various screens and computers. The atmosphere is tense yet professional.

A focused shot on a journalist's hand holding up the headline 'CSIS Study Finds More Left-Wing Than Right-Wing Domestic Terrorist Incidents in Early 2025', with concerned expressions as they read aloud.
A map highlighting the five instances of left-wing terrorism with a soft focus on key locations and dates.
A quiet room where the journalist sits alone with a notepad as they contemplate their next steps.
